title: DaNNy001
author: DaNNy001
content: HISTORICAL EVENTToday being may 22nd marks 13 years since the famous bitcoiner Laszlo Hanyecz paid 10000 BTC for two papa John's pizza which was delivered to him and looking at that same figure today records a whooping sum of 268000000k $ in today's market price cap. Funny enough this historical event is marked as a symbol in the crypto world today so am using this medium to remind everyone in the forum about this Wonderful event that happened 13years ago @ may 22nd 2010.So once again happy bitcoin pizza day to everyone in the forum.

comments.author: zaim7413
comments.body: This historical event began on May 18 2010 when Laszlo Hanyecz made a challenge on the BTT Forum with the topic entitled Pizza for bitcoins?. In his upload he offers 10,000 Bitcoin for anyone who is willing to send him two pizza. Four days after the topic was created on May 22, 2010, Laszlo Hanyecz reported that he had successfully traded 10,000 bitcoins for 2 pizza, this transaction marked the first time Bitcoin was used as a means of payment.QuoteI just want to report that I successfully traded 10,000 bitcoins for pizza.Pictures: http://heliacal.net/~solar/bitcoin/pizza/Thanks jercos!Proof of the transaction:Address used by Laszlo1XPTgDRhN8RFnzniWCddobD9iKZatrvH4Address used by Jercos17SkEw2md5avVNyYgj6RiXuQKNwkXaxFyQMay 22 is always remembered as Bitcoin Pizza Day because on that day a great event occurred which marked Bitcoin as a new transaction tool. I think this special day needs to be celebrated as it has been done in previous years like the Pizza baking contest.
